name: Popular Day Hikes: Northern Okanagan - Revise
categories: Popular Day Hikes: Northern Okanagan - Revise
description: The 35 popular day hikes in this guidebook cover the area stretching from Grindrod in the north to Vernon in the south, and between the Okanagan Valley and the Shuswap. Find hidden trails and walk well-trod pathways, with little need for rigorous bushwhacking or tricky scrambling. Routes lead through semi-desert, lakeside or mountain landscapes, and feature a diverse selection of flowering shrubs, plants, and wildlife along the way. Revised second edition features a fresh design and the most current route updates.
